params.name:
Duration

The duration for how long it takes IN STEPS
(If Ease Type is INSTANT, this does nothing)

Ease Type

INSTANT: Uhh, what to you think this does LOL
Any other ease: the EASE
(Leave this empty to emulate 'CLASSIC' type)

Zoom Type

stage: multiplies stage zoom by set amount
direct: sets stage zoom to set amount

Duration Type

Seconds: Use seconds to determine the tween
Steps: Use seconds to determine the tween
